note.p: Career: Fellow and Tutor of Balliol College, Oxford; Bedford Lecturer in Physical Chemistry, University of Oxford
Honours: MC 1916; CBE 1919; Kt 1928; KCVO 1944; GCVO 1957; CH 1967
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1973 vol 19 pp 349-373, plate, by A G Ogston
